author: Mirror Football
title: Pick YOUR Manchester United XI for crunch Premier League clash against Liverpool

organizations.name: liverpool sport pick your manchester united xi

text:
Sport Pick YOUR Manchester United XI for crunch Premier League clash against Liverpool   games in the Premier League season so far, meaning there is an even greater importance on the managers to get their team selections correct   this man's shoes? (Photo: John Peters/Man Utd via Getty Images)   
For some, it is the biggest club football game on the planet. 
And with Manchester United's recent form, Sunday's clash against Liverpool has just ramped up in terms of level of importance. 
Jose Mourinho's men are just three points off the Champions League places and can truly prove their top four credentials with a win over their greatest rivals. 
It means there is added importance on Mourinho's team selection - so who would you pick? 
  the XI you would pick if you could stand in the Portuguese's shoes. Like us on Facebook
